What If I Miss A Battle? Will It Come Again?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance Archive (GameBoy Advance): Battles: What If I Miss A Battle? Will It Come Again?
By Anonymous on Tuesday, May 7, 2002 - 04:57 pm:

What if I missed one of the dates to unlock a
monster, will i ever get another chance?

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, May 7, 2002 - 07:34 pm:

Yes, it comes every year, just stay on the ranch in the month of the invitation (don't go get any techs that month) then the next month the tourney will appear. Keep checking your battle schedule.
